word: The Israelites placed over their doors a signature of blood, to show that they were God\92s property. So every child of God in this age will bear the signature God has appointed. . . . God declares, \93I gave them my sabbaths, to be a sign between me and them, that they might know that I am the Lord that doth sanctify them.\94 When people say that the law of God is abrogated by the testimonies of \93the fathers,\94 they are teaching for doctrine the commandments of men. . . .
